related_post.text: Can anyone teach me on how a Python script can find the user's IP Address and then uses it with his permission ofc

so_post.text: `python get external IP` gives me <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2311510/gettingamachinesexternalipaddresswithpython> which says it's generally not possible if you're behind a router or something. Use some API that you can ping and get your IP back.
